product_name: La Roche-PosayToleriane Dermallergo Soothing Repair Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Dermallergo Soothing Repair Face Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin hydrates, soothes and comforts dry skin while replenishing the skin barrier. *Packaging may vary.
details: DetailsBenefitsDaily face moisturizer for sensitive skin intensely hydrates, soothes and protects dry skinCalming, refreshing, fast-absorbing cream texture provides instant and long-lasting comfortFormulated without ingredients that can potentially irritate sensitive skinHelps restore the natural skin barrierProvides soothing and antioxidant benefits with mineral-rich La-Roche Posay Thermal Spring WaterReplenishes hydration with shea butterSuitable for sensitive skin and dry skinAir-tight packaging prevents contamination and ensures purityNon-comedogenicDermatologist and allergy testedKey IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesNeurosensine helps reduce signs of skin sensitivityShea butter helps nourish dry skin and visibly reduce signs of skin irritationFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensAlcoholPreservativesItem 2539629How To UseApply to the face and neck morning and evening. Use daily.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Isocetyl Stearate, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter/Shea Butter, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Zea Mays Starch/Corn Starch, Pentylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Salvia Miltiorrhiza Root Extract, Dimethiconol, Sodium Hydroxide, Sphingomonas Ferment Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer.
how_to_use: Apply to the face and neck morning and evening. Use daily.

reviews.headline: Great Moisturizer
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive and acne-prone skin, and I love this moisturizer! It is a little pricy for the amount you get, but I highly recommend it. It is lightweight, which makes it great for the summer but very hydrating for those cold winter nights.

reviews.headline: Lovely moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is one of the best and competes with the most exoensive. The dispenser is a pump and 4 pumps does my face am before spf and pm before retinols. Absolutely will repurchase. Buy this you wont regret it.

reviews.headline: Fantastic moisturizer
reviews.comments: Been using this for years and it hasn't let me down. I have very dry and sensitive skin and this does the trick both in Winter and Summer.

reviews.headline: Could not recommend this enough
reviews.comments: My skin has become overly sensitive as of late and everything was irritating and drying. This stuff is amazing. Helped my skin calm down and feel incredible. Will buy again.

reviews.headline: Love this Moisturizer! Have used it for a long time❤️
reviews.comments: Wonderful Moisturizer!

reviews.headline: Sensitive Skin Friendly
reviews.comments: After scouring the internet for the best moisturizer for extremely sensitive and reactive skin, i have found the PERFECT no nonsense moisturizer! No fragrance, or chemicals that immediately burn my skin! I would recommend this to everyone!

reviews.headline: Only Lotion/Cream for My Sensitive Skin
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin and when it's really irritated this does not sting or burn or cause a rash. It's not quite emolient enough for Michigan winters so I add a drop or two of Biossance Sqalane & Copper Peptide serum. Not fragranced. I'm on my 4th bottle now. Great stuff! I would recommend to a friend, and have!

reviews.headline: Please change the formula back!
reviews.comments: I have religiously used this Brand's product for years, specifically this moisturizer. For the life of me I could not understand why my face was burning and stinging when I got out of the shower, now I know why. they changed the formula in their products. When I tell you my face was red, dry, and stinging for days after using this moisturizer. It was terrible. I'm so disappointed and now I have to find a new  skin care regimen.

reviews.headline: Best Quick Fix for KP on face!
reviews.comments: I had this product for a while as I love most LRP products but wouldn't use it daily as the smell scared me. I started using it mixed with my daily moisturizer at night as a last resort and the KP on my face goes away almost overnight with this stuff!!

reviews.headline: New Favorite
reviews.comments: I have been dealing with perioral dermatitis and this is the only moisturizer I trust right now. I use it both day and night. It leaves my skin feeling so good! Great under makeup, too. I just wish I could get the lid off to get the last bit of product.

reviews.headline: Been using for ever a year!
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive, breakout prone, and aging skin. This is the best moisturizer that i have found and trust me… I have tried too many. My only complaint is that the product is inside a bag inside the bottle and the top doesn't screw off so i feel like im waisti g product when its two empty to pump and I can't access the insode to scrape out the remaining moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Wish there was more product
reviews.comments: I switched to this from the blue bottle and im so glad. It absorbs well, softens skin, and doesnt leave skin greasy or tacky. I would buy a big bottle of this. I wish it werent so expensive.

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I was looking for something that might be better than the Cerave lotion I was using for a long time that had parabens in it. My skin is sensitive and lots of things tend to irritate or break me out. Nothing changed but this lotion. I don't know what's in it that did it, but I immediately started breaking out. It claims to be for sensitive skin, but I'll take the parabens over that. And they've recently taken them out. So I won't be using this lotion.

reviews.headline: Horrible new formula
reviews.comments: This is not gentle whatsover!!! It smells like paint thinner and Shea butter not in a good way either.. I was lit up like a red tomatoe.. horrible horrible .. stay away its not for sensitive skin.. adding cheap ingredients and hiking up prices is what most everyone is doing now days.  Nothing is of any quality only for profits.  It's already a super small bottle for a high price tag now its not even worth using if it manages the barrier too.. ughhh

reviews.headline: not rosaeca friendly
reviews.comments:
I have severe rosacea and am on the hunt for an affordable moisturizer.  I currently use environ super moisturiser but it is costly. 
I bought this La Roche posay moisturizer and it burned immediately. 
my skin is still recovering as this caused my rosacea to flare up.
I guess I'm still searching for my perfect affordable moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Literally the only moisturizer that has put my rosacea at ease. Only downside is it is quite expensive for such a small bottle.

reviews.headline: It's working for me this winter
reviews.comments: I have dry skin that can be sensitive to ingredients in moisturizers. I use two pumps of this on my face, twice a day after cleansing and serum. I apply serum to damp skin, let it soak in, then apply the moisturizer. Out of several sensitive skin moisturizers I tried so far, this is the only one that never makes me itchy or red. My skin is less flaky and inflamed than usual this winter so I think this is working for me and I will repurchase. It seems to layer well with other products and makeup.

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: This product.... I cannot say enough great things!! I break out with a lot of moisturizers, but THIS ONE actually helped CLEAR my breakouts. It says on the box it's tested on allergy-prone skin, so I tried it and I'm SO GLAD I did. Also wearable under makeup and great for any time of day. Love this. Just went and bought another bottle!!!

reviews.headline: BRING BACK OLD FORMULA!
reviews.comments: Don't claim to not change the formula when the ingredients are different on the packaging. It burns my face, caused acne, smells terrible. like why. why are brands changing things that are already big sellers???

reviews.headline: Reformulated < \3
reviews.comments:
I am so upset. This was the only thing that worked for my sensitive, acne-prone skin. I recently ran out of the original moisturizer and bought this new one without realizing it had changed. In days, my skin broke out with painful acne all over my cheeks. 

Why would you reformulate something that worked for so many people? Safe to say, I am returning the moisturizer I bought and I'll have to look elsewhere for something that my skin will tolerate. Very disappointed in LRP. Please do the right thing and bring back the original formula.

media.headline: I really love this one. It gives deep moisture!
media.caption: So soft!

faceoff_positive.comments:
This is one my essential moisturizers that I always have at the ready.  I have eczema prone sensitive skin and my favorite thing about Toleriane line is that I can use these products during a flare up and know that it will not add to the irritation as well as use them in between flares without worry. 

The Ultra Face Moisturizer is moisturizing, versatile, and lightweight enough to wear under makeup.  My office is incredibly dry. So I do mix it with a facial oil during the week. This has to do more with being in an dry environment for 8+ hours daily, 5 days a week. I still prefer the Ultra because it gives me the option to wear it alone, in conjunction with a facial oil, or under makeup without feeling like I'm coated in layers of lotion.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Lightweight Moisturizer

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm very disappointed that this moisturizer has been reformulated. This was a holy grail for me as it was the only moisturizer that calmed and moisturized my skin. The last time i purchased this moisturizer I had picked up two of the   new boxes and one old box. At the time I didn't think there was a reformulation only a name change until I had used the product. I go through one bottle a month and didn't notice the reformulation until last month when my acne started to come back. I didn't change any products in my rotation and realized that it is the moisturizer breaking me out and irritating my skin. It became obvious because the month when I used the old formula my skin was glowing, smooth, and even. As a loyal customer of many years I will now have to search for a new moisturizer, so I do hope you will bring back the old formula.
faceoff_negative.headline: Reformulated product breaks me out

rollup.name: Toleriane Dermallergo Soothing Repair Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin
